summary: THE GAS GAUGE WAS NOT WORKING CORRECTLY.  THE GAS LIGHT INDICATED THE TANK WAS EMPTY AFTER FUELING.  VEHICLE FAILED MD. INSPECTION TO DUE THE FAILED UNIT. CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THE DEFECTIVE COMPONET WAS NO LONGER UNDER WARRANTY. *NLM
